title: Tap to Roll
summary: A dice roller app with a super simple UI, making it easy to roll some dice quickly.
long_summary: Tap to Roll is a dice roller app with a super simple UI with the goal of making it as easy as possible to roll some dice. Rather than mess with "number of dice" or "number of sides" fields, just tap the desired die a number of times.

gallery.alt: Eight dice icons ranging from d2 to d100.
gallery.caption: Supports all the standard dice types.

gallery.alt: Table showing min roll, max roll, sum of rolls, and each individual roll result.
gallery.caption: The results of casting DnD's Chaos Bolt spell.
